detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_renew_entry: Renews the attributes for an entry.
Sets the attributes for an entry located in the cache by its address. Attributes are provided with compliance to the underlying FSAL semantics. Attributes that are set are returned in "*pattr".

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry for the parent directory to be managed.
[OUT] renewed attributes for the entry that we have found.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if operation is a success
Other errors shows a FSAL error.

briefdescription.para: Renews an entry in the cache inode.

detaileddescription.para:
